StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [GetChangeRequestDateChange]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
(@ID uniqueiden..er)
AS
SELECT cr.[ID], cr.[NWA_ID], cr.[CREATED_ON], cr.[SUBMITTED_ON], cr.[CHANGE_REQUEST_STATUS_ID], crs.[DESCRIPTION] as STATUS_DESCRIPTION, cr.[CHANGE_REQUEST_TYPE_ID], cr.[CHANGE_REQUEST_LEVEL_ID_CURRENT], cr.[CHANGE_REQUEST_LEVEL_ID_FINAL], cr.[DETAILS], cr.[APPR_DISAPPR_ON], cr.[MODIFIED_ON], cr.[MODIFIED_BY], cr.[SIGNED_BY], cr.[BY_DIRECTION], crdc.[TO_DATE] FROM [USMC].[CHANGE_REQUEST] cr LEFT JOIN [USMC].[CHANGE_REQUEST_DATE_CHANGE] crdc on crdc.[CHANGE_REQUEST_ID] = cr.[ID] LEFT JOIN [USMC].[CHANGE_REQUEST_STATUS] crs on crs.[ID] = cr.[CHANGE_REQUEST_STATUS_ID] WHERE cr.[ID] = @ID
